changes.text: Add basic Analytics API.
Handle File in Use better for systems without locking (due to filesystems or scripts).
Improve Permission Checking for drop folders
Improvements to first time setup process
Properly get ALL updated anime when too many have updated
Fix MovieDB image getting
Fix Plex Linking
Fix an error with Year calculation in some cases
Fix rare issues preventing startup
Error with creating ssl/tls secure channel.
Sort File for episodes by File Quality Preferences in Desktop.
Fix Adding Files to MyList with Manually Linked Files.
Hopefully fix rare error with Downloading Release Group Status.
Delete Episode and Override Links when Deleting TvDB Links.
Fix some logic errors and state when adding Manually Linked files.
Redo Search in API to Return More Useful Results
CommandRequest query optimisations.
Fixed ban timer, ban time now extends on subsequent bans.
Revert mono to 5.4 to resolve problems with web-api connections/commands.
Additional work on the new TVDB linking system.
Hide Setup tab and make the Settings tab the default tab.
Delete and Recreate All Tag Filters on Recreate All Groups.
When MyList ID is missing add file first then update the state.
Automatically create and initialize SQLite DB on first run.
Fix an issue when attempting to link your Plex account.
Null Check some things in File Quality Filter.
Add a flag to AddFileToMyList, so we can skip reading.
Parse MyList ID from adding files.
When adding files to MyList, send the watched state if we have one.
Fix an erorr when attempting to manually link a series.
Fix an issue when attempting to access a file that's already in use.
Add Storage state "remote storage" to AniDB storage state list.  Added Environment variable configuration on first run.
Added Environment variable configuration on first run.
Seperate AniDB ban types to be both HTTP and UDP instead of a signular ban.
Additional improvements to AniDB Image rate limting.
General improvements made to the AniDB MyList updating process.
Shoko will now ignore the Recycle Bin when scanning import folders.
Improve Year filter logic.
Use environment for program data location allowing for non-standard setups to work better.
changed logging during startup.
Move Docker install to be able to launch as non-root user.
Completely rework the plex workflow so that authentication and updating is a lot nicer.
Redid TvDB Linking system and made major improvements to TVDB system.
Use Mono 5.12 on docker.
Allow "Unknown" storage state in AniDB.
Fixed an issue with pre-populated usernames causing issues when switching languages in Shoko and creating a new database.
Fixed an issue where Cloud Accounts could not be added or managed.
Fixed an issues when attempting to update AniDB MyList.
Fixed an issues with Renamer failing to move all files.
Fix updating watch status on AniDB MyList.
Fixed an issue where user added series community links were removed when adding additonal ones.
Fixed an issue where episode data was not being changed for currently airing series.
Prevent clearing command queues freezing the UI.
Ignore Recycle Bin during import scanning.
Fix various issues when using OneDrive as a provider.
Support new trakt authentication.
Fix an issue when qutoes are used or present during file renaming.
Removed MAL access and syncing.
